overview:
Roger has more than 20 years of software engineering and technology leadership experience. He joined OnApp after co-founding Ambient Industries, developer of flook, the location browser for iPhone. He was a co-founder of Sonopia, an MVNO, where he was VP Engineering and CTO. He has also worked at TI, where he defined global software strategy for the company’s Wireless Terminal business unit.

Before that, Roger worked at Psion and was a founder member of Symbian. He architected Symbian’s comms infrastructure, ran consulting operations in the UK and Japan, and finally had overall responsibility for Symbian’s development and technology roadmap. Roger’s tech experience also stretches back to the early days of desktop virtualization: he began his career at Insignia, writing virtualization software for the NeXT personal computer.
